Robertson)', 'research_objective': 'Determine specific birthplace', 'birth_year': '1792', 'confirmed_country': 'Scotland', 'specific_locations_mentioned': [ 'Kelso, Scotland', 'Edinburgh, Scotland' ], 'source_consensus': 'Multiple authoritative sources confirm Scottish birth', 'education_location': 'Dalkeith, Scotland', 'family_context': 'Father worked as assistant-secretary of the Bank of Scotland', 'sources_consulted': [ 'Wikipedia', 'Dictionary of National Biography (1885-1900)', 'Hispanic-Anglosphere biographical database', 'Encyclopedia.com', 'Various genealogical and historical sources' ], 'certainty_level': 'High - Multiple authoritative sources agree', 'additional_context': { 'profession': 'Scottish merchant and author', 'notable_work': 'Paraguay merchant, one of the Robertson brothers', 'family': 'Brother to William Parish Robertson (1795-?)', 'business_location': 'South America (Paraguay, Argentina)', 'death_year': '1843' } } # Create a comprehensive birthplace determination file timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S") birthplace_file = f"workspace/jp_robertson_birthplace_determination_{timestamp}.json" with open(birthplace_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(birthplace_analysis, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) # Create a clear summary report summary_file = f"workspace/jp_robertson_birthplace_final_answer_{timestamp}.txt" with open(summary_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write("J.P. ROBERTSON BIRTHPLACE RESEARCH - FINAL DETERMINATION\n") f.write("=" * 60 + "\n\n") f.write("RESEARCH QUESTION: Where was J.P. Robertson (John Parish Robertson) born?\n\n") f.write("DEFINITIVE ANSWER:\n") f.write("John Parish Robertson was born in SCOTLAND in 1792.\n") f.write("Specific locations: Kelso or Edinburgh, Scotland\n\n") f.write("EVIDENCE SUMMARY:\n") f.write("• Wikipedia: 'Robertson was born at Kelso or Edinburgh'\n") f.write("• Dictionary of National Biography: 'was born at Kelso or Edinburgh in 1792'\n") f.write("• Hispanic-Anglosphere: 'Born in Scotland, and educated in Dalkeith'\n") f.write("• Encyclopedia.com: 'The Robertson brothers...born in Scotland'\n") f.write("• Multiple sources describe him as 'Scottish by birth'\n\n") f.write("ADDITIONAL BIOGRAPHICAL CONTEXT:\n") f.write(f"• Full Name: John Parish Robertson\n") f.write(f"• Birth Year: 1792\n") f.write(f"• Birth Country: Scotland\n") f.write(f"• Specific Birth Locations: Kelso or Edinburgh\n") f.write(f"• Education: Dalkeith, Scotland\n") f.write(f"• Family: Father was assistant-secretary of the Bank of Scotland\n") f.write(f"• Brother: William Parish Robertson (also born in Scotland, 1795)\n") f.write(f"• Profession: Merchant and author\n") f.write(f"• Business Focus: South American trade (Paraguay)\n") f.write(f"• Death Year: 1843\n\n") f.write("RESEARCH METHODOLOGY:\n") f.write("• Conducted comprehensive biographical searches using Google Search API\n") f.write("• Consulted multiple authoritative sources including:\n") f.write(" - Wikipedia\n") f.write(" - Dictionary of National Biography (1885-1900)\n") f.write(" - Hispanic-Anglosphere biographical database\n") f.write(" - Encyclopedia.com\n") f.write(" - Various genealogical and historical sources\n") f.write("• Cross-referenced information across multiple sources\n") f.write("• Achieved high confidence level due to source consensus\n\n") f.write("CONCLUSION:\n") f.write("John Parish Robertson (J.P. Robertson) was definitively born in Scotland in 1792,\n") f.write("specifically at either Kelso or Edinburgh. All major biographical sources\n") f.write("consistently confirm his Scottish birth and provide additional context about\n") f.write("his Scottish upbringing, education, and family background.\n") print(f"\n📄 FILES CREATED:") print(f"• Birthplace analysis: {birthplace_file}") print(f"• Final answer summary: {summary_file}") print(f"\n🎯 FINAL BIRTHPLACE DETERMINATION:") print("=" * 40) print(f"✅ COUNTRY: Scotland") print(f"✅ SPECIFIC LOCATIONS: Kelso or Edinburgh") print(f"✅ BIRTH YEAR: 1792") print(f"✅ CONFIDENCE LEVEL: High (multiple authoritative sources agree)") print(f"\n📊 EVIDENCE STRENGTH:") print(f"• Wikipedia: ✅ Confirms Scottish birth (Kelso or Edinburgh)") print(f"• Dictionary of National Biography: ✅ Confirms Scottish birth (Kelso or Edinburgh, 1792)") print(f"• Hispanic-Anglosphere: ✅ Confirms 'Born in Scotland'") print(f"• Encyclopedia.com: ✅ Confirms Robertson brothers 'born in Scotland'") print(f"• Multiple sources: ✅ Describe as 'Scottish by birth'") print(f"\n✅ RESEARCH OBJECTIVE COMPLETED!") print(f"J.P.
